channel.title: Updated Server source?
channel.description:
I have a dedi paid off for next 3 months..
atm it is just chilling doin nothing but fast map dl for my css servers lol
Anywho i could use kingpk source and bring it back but im looking to do something diffrent..
Anyone wanting to make there own server etc let me know or link me to a source and ill have it online within time of downloading source..
No donations will be needed for this server. unless it grows alot passed the 3 months.
No spam.
Will not give out login details to dedi. will set up ftp or user account on it for who wants to help run it.. not full admin rights...
admin to whoever wants to bring a server up and links to a good source.

item.title: Updated Server source?
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

We have gathered Kozy is a dipshit. There is nothing more to say because he wont understand you.

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Server source?
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“Kozy, post:11, topic:281884”][quote author=Powerslave link=topic=372512.msg2814142#msg2814142 date=1244171642]
Kozy, if no one is worthy of running a server, and it isn’t their source, then why are you helping (I use that term loosely) to run a server?
[/quote]

Lmao. You don’t know what the hell your talking about. Oh, and I do it because I can mate, and my server doesn’t fail. (Yet all the servers you’ve had never went above 10 ppl.)

-Kozy[/quote]

Yet again, L2Read.

-Kozy

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

dear god:

Well then kozy, why aren’t you flaming every other server owner including yourself?

Because Pork is the only ignorant fuck who flames me on msn, saying I fail and such.

-Kozy

item.title: Updated Server source?
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

I did make sense, but your illiterate brain doesn’t know the definition of words. I said that nobody [bold]DESERVES[/bold] to have a server. That doesn’t mean people can’t have one. That just means that they aren’t lets say… “Worthy”, as it isn’t there source, it’s JaGex’s. L2read next time, Nice try, Kid.

-Kozy

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Server source?
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“Powerslave, post:1, topic:282137”][quote author=Kozy link=topic=372512.msg2812360#msg2812360 date=1244066648]

Add me on MSN: bronze_dagger@live.com

Lol, you don’t know the first thing about running a server.

-Kozy
[/quote]

And you do? You’re one of the worst administrators I’ve ever seen (regarding your “performance” on RSCReloaded).[/quote]

Oh really? That’s why 75% of the players think I’m the best mod/admin? Yeah… I garentee I’ve modded/admin’ed more servers than u m8. You only say that because you get on and spam, and ask for help which is not needed therefore receive none.

@Dear- Nobody deserves to have a server. The only “Runescape” Server should be the ones from JaGex.

-Kozy

Read full topic
